channel.title: Go Humble! RSS SOFTWARE
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle software bundles!

item.title: Learn Game Dev with Unity, Godot, Unreal, GameMaker, Blender & C#
item.content:encoded: Passionate about video games? Then start making your own! Our latest bundle will help you learn vital game development skills. Master the most popular creation platforms like Unity, Godot, Unreal, GameMaker, Blender, and C#—now that’s a sharp-lookin’ bundle! Build a 2.5D farming RPG with Unreal Engine, create a micro turn-based RPG in Godot, explore game optimization, and so much more. Get the expert advice and knowledge you need to become an elite game creator, and help support CARE with your purchase!

item.title: The Complete Python, Machine Learning, Bots and AI Mega Bundle+
item.content:encoded: Looking to break into data science or land your first data engineering role? This exclusive bundle is your complete toolkit for building a job-ready portfolio using Python, Pandas, and Scikit-Learn! Ideal for beginners and career-switchers—every lesson is practical, approachable, and focused on real outcomes. Actively learn from hands-on projects that mirror the challenges faced by real-world data professionals. Get hot courses that’ll prepare you for the field like today and help support The American Cancer Society with your purchase!

item.title: Wanderlust Summer: Travel & Learn with Lonely Planet / uTalk
item.content:encoded: Learn key words and phrases in another language—and so much more—with our latest bundle. This collaboration with Lonely Planet and uTalk offers 50+ travel ebooks from local travel experts, revealing everything you need to plan the trip of a lifetime, no matter what time of year you go. Plus, get 25+ language courses with video! Familiarize yourself with the words and culture of the Japanese, Filipinos, French, and more. Get the expert advice and planning help you need, and support World Central Kitchen with your purchase!

item.title: Big Bang Unreal & Unity Asset Packs Bundle ( 75 Products )
item.content:encoded: Calling all game devs—build your worlds with this gigantic bundle of over 5000 assets, including realistic and stylized environments, SFX packs, and powerful tools. Perfect for hobbyists, beginners, and professional developers alike, you'll gain access to essential resources, tutorials, and beta-testing–ready content to start building immediately. The experts at Leartes Studios have curated an amazing library packed with value, featuring environments, VFX packs, and tutorial courses on Unreal Engine, Blender, Substance Painter, and ZBrush. Get the assets you need to bring your game to life—and help support One Tree Planted with your purchase! This bundle provides Unity Asset Store keys directly with your purchase, and FAB keys via redemption through Cosmos, if the product is available on those platforms.

item.title: No-Code No Problem Game Dev Bundle
item.description: DRM-Free Assets & A No-Code GameDev Course!
item.content:encoded: Stuck in a time crunch on your latest project? Kick your development cycle into hyperdrive with the new No-Code, No Problem Game Dev Bundle from GDevelop. Save time, money, and effort with this curated library of unique and helpful DRM-FREE asset packs designed to deliver fast, high-quality results. Get 6 months of GDevelop Silver for free, along with amazing collections like the Pixel Dark Fantasy Bundle, Sci-Fi Space Village, and more. Explore the GDevelop Master Course and learn how to make a game quickly, no coding required! Bring your next game to life, and help support the Prevent Cancer Foundation with your purchase!

item.title: FlippedNormals Extreme Add-ons Bundle for Blender & ZBrush
item.content:encoded:
Get quality add-ons for Blender and ZBrush with our latest bundle! We’ve teamed up with the pros at FlippedNormals to deliver a gigantic library of powerful tools for your next game development project. Add new life to your creative work with standout assets like Real-time Hair ZBrush Plugin, Physical Starlight and Atmosphere, Easy Mesh ZBrush Plugin, and more. Get the add-ons you need to bring color and individuality to your next project—and help support Extra Life with your purchase!

Free lifetime updates are not included in the bundle purchase. All creators have included coupon codes in the bundle, so you can purchase directly from their shop at a discounted price to receive updates and full support.

item.title: 3D Artist Tools & Brushes Mega Bundle
item.content:encoded: Calling all game developers, graphic artists, and budding printmakers—create your art using the elite tools in this awesome library. Our latest Mega Bundle offers 50+ collections of tools, assets, plugins, and brushes fit for any style of work. Use industry-leading resources like the Bags & Pouches Collection and Hard-Surface Kitbash Collection. Get the assets you need to bring your next project to life, and help support Save the Children with your purchase!

item.title: Sound Explosion: 100+ Packs of Royalty Free Music & Sound Effects
item.content:encoded: Create the perfect audioscape for your game, film, or creative project with this amazing bundle of royalty-free sounds from Audio Hero! This massive library features 100+ samples, tracks, instruments, and more. Get the tools you need to achieve the sound you’re looking for with unique audio assets like the Global Creator Mix, YouTube Creator’s SFX, and YouTube Creator’s Music. Pay what you want and help support Children's Miracle Network Hospitals with your purchase!
